select t_company.id,t_company.name,COUNT(auth_user.companyid) as choice from t_company LEFT JOIN auth_user on t_company.id=auth_user.companyid and menuid=#{menuid} AND userid=#{userid} where isdelete=0 and t_company.id in ( select companyid from ( select t_demp.companyid from t_demp LEFT JOIN auth_user on t_demp.id=auth_user.dempid and menuid=#{menuid} AND userid=#{userid} where t_demp.id not in (SELECT dempid from auth_user where userid !=#{userid} AND menuid=#{menuid} AND postid is NULL) and t_demp.id not in (SELECT demp_id from t_post) and t_demp.isdelete=0 union all select t_demp.companyid from t_post left JOIN t_demp on t_demp.id=t_post.demp_id LEFT JOIN auth_user on t_demp.id=auth_user.dempid and menuid=#{menuid} AND userid=#{userid} where t_post.isdelete = 0 and t_post.id not in (SELECT postid from auth_user where userid !=#{userid} AND menuid=#{menuid} AND postid is not NULL) and t_demp.isdelete=0 ) aaa GROUP BY companyid ) group by t_company.id,t_company.name
select c.id, c.number, c.name, pc.number as pNum, "company" as type from t_company c left join t_company pc on pc.id = c.pId where c.isdelete = 0

select * from t_company where number = #{number} and isdelete = 0
